item.title: Striking a Balance: When Churches Go Overboard with Social Media
item.description: In the ever-evolving digital era, social media has transformed the way we communicate, interact, and acquire information. Social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube have become powerful tools for spreading messages and creating connections with people worldwide. It is not just individuals and businesses that leverage social media, but also religious organizations, including churches, who see its great potential as a means to disseminate their religious messages to a broader audience.
